title: Quilt, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: copperplate printed on plain weave
description: Obverse is comprised of two pieces of toile. The design is known as The Victory of Washington or The Apotheosis of Franklin. Reverse is made of three pieces of toile depicting rural festivities, including a maypole dance. Bound on the edges with white tape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Quilt, ca. 1800.Medium: cotton
Technique: copperplate printed on plain weave. 1934-9-1.
